body.p: In this week's Gentoo Weekly Newsletter, we cover the Gentoo Managers' Meeting held on the 1st of December. The managers discussed the new release naming scheme which takes effect next year, as well as the implementation of GLEP 14, which is designed to check a system for identified security holes and auto-apply fixes. We also profile developer Robin Hugh Johnson, give you a tip about using ls, and bring you plenty of other content too. Enjoy!
